d:
Quick Links
- Legend Clover 2025 secret scenes: https://e-hentai.org/g/3714929/88818b1407/
- 800x1000 GIFs (contain surrounding space): https://pixeldrain.com/l/hEwxzvL5

Available character expressions and the idle animation for that character. Focused on 2025 only.

Event Order starting from the beginning of 2025:
1/14 => cleopatra (1-21)
1/28 => onsen (22-52)
2/11 => valentine (53-87)
2/25 => sister (88-107)
3/11 => school, sigurd (108-150)
3/25 => schoolpart2 (151-185)
4/8 => fairytale (186-228)
4/22 => fairytalepart2 (229-272)
5/7 => little (273-294)
5/20 => piacarrot (295-336)
6/3 => wedding (337-367)
6/17 => weddingpart2 (368-419)
7/1 => threekingdoms (420-440)
7/15 => summer (441-463)
7/15 => summer abyss? (464-483)
7/29 => swimsuit (484-514)
8/12 => swimsuitpart2 (515-547)
8/19 => lucifer (622-631)
8/26 => swimsuitcollab (548-587)
9/9 => pajamas (588-621)
9/24 => mage (632-651)
10/7 => 4thanniversary (652-682)
10/21 => 4thanniversarypart2 (683-705)
11/4 => 4thanniversarypart3 (706-739)
11/18 => demons (740-759)
12/2 => bunny (760-799)
12/16 => christmas (800-820)
12/31 => newyears (821-861)

Changelog

- 4/28/2025 => initial gallery from first event in 2025 up to April 22nd
- 5/7/2025 => added the two little characters in this release.
- 5/11/2025 => major gallery update: re-uploaded all GIFs and character sprites to be the cropped versions. Since this site has a 10 MB GIF limit, the width varies a lot depending on how wide or tall the character is, etc.
- 5/17/2025 => added the event character animations (what shows in the intro and outro animations of the event).
- 5/20/2025 => added new piacarrot character animations.
- 6/3/2025 => added new wedding character animations.
- 6/23/2025 => added character animations for part 2 of the new wedding event. Also fixed Joka (wedding) as she had a ribbon that wasn't removed at her wrist; the pixeldrain archive also got updated with the fix.
- 7/2/2025 => added femme fatale without mask from previous event, and character animations for new three kingdoms event.
- 7/15/2025 => added new summer swimsuit character animations.
- 7/17/2025 => added new summer event abyss characters (Skoll, Beelzebub).
- 8/6/2025 => added swimsuit event characters that had secret scenes.
- 8/10/2025 => added swimsuit event (part 2) characters that will have secret scenes.
- 8/24/2025 => added swimsuit Katia, and Lucifer character animations.
- 9/24/2025 => added new mage event. Since the swimsuit collab and pajamas events animations aren't in this gallery yet, some re-arranging will happen later.
- 10/4/2025 => added swimsuit collab characters (Arisa, Kukunochi, Yamato). Also re-arranged the gallery so Katia appears in this area, and Lucifer comes after the swimsuit collab. Pajamas event still needs to be done.
- 10/14/2025 => added 4th anniversary characters (Jeanne & Michael, Juno, Littley).
- 10/18/2025 => up to date now with the addition of pajamas event. Some re-ordering happened.
- 10/26/2025 => added 4th anniversary part 2 characters (Gilles De Rais, Master Saffie).
- 11/11/2025 => added 4th anniversary part 3 characters (Hohenheim old, Nero, Nyarlathotep).
- 11/13/2025 => added intro and outro animations for Nero and Master Saffie from 4th anniversary part 3 event.
- 12/7/2025 => added the two demons from November 18th (Bael, Barbatos).
- 12/14/2025 => added the four characters from the December 2nd bunny event. I encountered an issue with the Benkei bunny animation, but was able to get the stills with the expressions.
- 12/17/2025 => added the two Christmas gal santa outfits for Isolde and Andromeda.
- 1/24/2026 => added the new years event characters, the last event of 2025 (Asklepios, Brunhild, Siegfried, Sol).
n: [Game CG] [DMM.com] Legend Clover 2025 Character Expressions and Idle Animations
